comment: Gotta get something off my chest . If you leave a blue state because it failed you ... Leave your Democrat voting habits there too . Why vote for the same failed Democrat policies you already ran away from ? The red states are attractive because of Republican policies & leadership .

                  :poss y)

                  :ARG1 (s2 / state
                        :mod (b / blue))
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (f / fail-01
                              :ARG1 s2)))
            :mod (t / too))
      :snt3 (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (v2 / vote-01

                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (p / policy-01

                                    :op1 "Democrat"))
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01)
                        :ARG2-of (r / run-16
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :time (a2 / already)
                              :direction (a3 / away)))))
      :snt4 (a4 / attract-01
            :ARG0 (a5 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / policy-01
                        :ARG0 (p4 / political-party
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Republican")))
                  :op2 (l3 / lead-02
                        :ARG0 p4))
            :ARG1 (s4 / state
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / red-02))
            :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 a5
                  :op1 (p5 / policy-01
                        :ARG0 p4)
                  :op2 l3
                  :ARG0 p4)))
